org.gridgain.grid
Interface GridTaskListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public interface GridTaskListener
extends EventListener

Deprecated in favor of listener available in GridFuture.

This interface defines task execution listener.

 void onFinished(GridTaskFuture<?> taskFut)
          Deprecated. 
 

Method Detail

onFinished

@Deprecated
void onFinished(GridTaskFuture<?> taskFut)
Deprecated. 

Deprecated in favor of listener available in GridFuture.

Called when grid task has finished its execution.

Parameters:
taskFut - Task future. The returned future will have completed task result and method GridFuture.isDone() will always return true.
